languages.text: "Ты действительно думаешь, что я руководствовался подобным сантиментом?.." {n}Хейнрикс внимательно всматривается в вас. Его лицо трудно прочитать, однако в последний момент дознаватель болезненно прищуривает один глаз — и отворачивается.{/n}
"You really think my actions are driven by such sentiment?" {n}Heinrix studies you intently. His face is difficult to read, but one of his eyes spasms briefly just before he turns away.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты действительно думаешь, что я руководствовался подобным сантиментом?.." {n}Хейнрикс внимательно всматривается в вас. Его лицо трудно прочитать, однако в последний момент дознаватель болезненно прищуривает один глаз — и отворачивается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You really think my actions are driven by such sentiment?" {n}Heinrix studies you intently. His face is difficult to read, but one of his eyes spasms briefly just before he turns away.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “你真的以为，我是由于一时多愁善感才做出这样的决定吗？”{n}海因里希认真地盯着你。你看不出他的表情意味着什么，但在他转过身之前，他的双眼短暂地痉挛了一下。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You really think my actions are driven by such sentiment?" {n}Heinrix studies you intently. His face is difficult to read, but one of his eyes spasms briefly just before he turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你真的以为，我是由于一时多愁善感才做出这样的决定吗？”{n}海因里希认真地盯着你。你看不出他的表情意味着什么，但在他转过身之前，他的双眼短暂地痉挛了一下。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¿De verdad cree que esos sentimientos motivan mis acciones?». {n}Heinrix te examina con atención. Es difícil deducir algo por su expresión, pero, antes de darse la vuelta, uno de sus ojos sufre un tic.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You really think my actions are driven by such sentiment?" {n}Heinrix studies you intently. His face is difficult to read, but one of his eyes spasms briefly just before he turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad cree que esos sentimientos motivan mis acciones?». {n}Heinrix te examina con atención. Es difícil deducir algo por su expresión, pero, antes de darse la vuelta, uno de sus ojos sufre un tic.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「我の行動がそんな感情に起因していると本当に思っているのですか？」{n}ハインリックスはあなたの様子をじっと観察する。彼の表情は読みにくいものの、目を背ける直前に片方の目が一瞬痙攣した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You really think my actions are driven by such sentiment?" {n}Heinrix studies you intently. His face is difficult to read, but one of his eyes spasms briefly just before he turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我の行動がそんな感情に起因していると本当に思っているのですか？」{n}ハインリックスはあなたの様子をじっと観察する。彼の表情は読みにくいものの、目を背ける直前に片方の目が一瞬痙攣した。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Pensez-vous vraiment que mes actes soient guidés par de telles émotions ? » {n}Heinrix vous étudie attentivement. Son visage n'est pas facile à lire, mais vous voyez l'un de ses yeux tressauter brièvement avant qu'il ne se retourne.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You really think my actions are driven by such sentiment?" {n}Heinrix studies you intently. His face is difficult to read, but one of his eyes spasms briefly just before he turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pensez-vous vraiment que mes actes soient guidés par de telles émotions ? » {n}Heinrix vous étudie attentivement. Son visage n'est pas facile à lire, mais vous voyez l'un de ses yeux tressauter brièvement avant qu'il ne se retourne.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Denkt Ihr wirklich, mein Handeln würde durch solche Gefühle geleitet?" {n}Heinrix mustert dich gründlich. Seine Miene ist schwer zu deuten, aber eines seiner Augen zuckt kurz, bevor er sich abwendet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You really think my actions are driven by such sentiment?" {n}Heinrix studies you intently. His face is difficult to read, but one of his eyes spasms briefly just before he turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Denkt Ihr wirklich, mein Handeln würde durch solche Gefühle geleitet?" {n}Heinrix mustert dich gründlich. Seine Miene ist schwer zu deuten, aber eines seiner Augen zuckt kurz, bevor er sich abwendet.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Eylemlerimi bu tip duyguların yönlendirdiğini mi düşünüyorsun gerçekten?" {n}Heinrix seni dikkatle inceliyor. Yüz ifadesini okuması zor olsa da bakışlarını çevirmeden önce gözlerinden biri hafifçe seğiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You really think my actions are driven by such sentiment?" {n}Heinrix studies you intently. His face is difficult to read, but one of his eyes spasms briefly just before he turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eylemlerimi bu tip duyguların yönlendirdiğini mi düşünüyorsun gerçekten?" {n}Heinrix seni dikkatle inceliyor. Okuması zor bir yüz ifadesine sahip ancak bakışlarını çevirmeden önce gözlerinden biri hafifçe seğiriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
